price: 107. sinni nafsi Yallih amrih cinat ganah yan mara macatinaay ken Afak mayaabin, Diggah Yalli gano как nabaah dambi как maggo mara mayakcinak.
arabic: وَلَا تُجَٰدِلۡ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡتَانُونَ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ مَن كَانَ خَوَّانًا أَثِيمٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walā tujādil ʿani alladhīna yakhtānūna anfusahum inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu man kāna khawwānan athīman
